about_the_game:
Knuckle Knockout is an action-packed 2D platformer fighting game for 2-4 players. Brawl with friends across three unique maps: clash in the lush greenery of Misty Mountains, battle amidst the rotating chaos of Pinwheel Pyramid, and face off atop the towering heights of Zero Hour Tower. Be the first to win three rounds and claim the crown! Master Knuckle Knockout’s unique Extend-o fist mechanic to punch opponents or launch yourself for thrilling platforming maneuvers.



  • Customize your play style with 8 distinct emotes—4 for your character's face and 4 for their fist.
  • Supports 2-4 gamepads, including Xbox One and PS4 controllers, for an engaging multiplayer experience.
  • Designed for accessibility, the game offers features to support players with color blindness, dyslexia, and motion sickness. Everyone can join the fight!



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

name: Knuckle Knockout

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: An action-packed 2D platformer fighting game for 2-4 players. Brawl with friends across three unique maps with the first player to win three rounds taking the crown!
